select food_id, food_name, food_type, food_price, food_num from tbl_menu limit #{page},#{limit}

mapper.insert: insert into menu( food_name, food_type, food_price, food_num ) values( #{foodName}, #{foodType}, #{foodPrice}, #{foodNum} )

mapper.select: select food_id, food_name, food_type, food_price, food_num from menu where food_type = #{foodType}
